data.prayer: Please, convict the 48 believers in Danilovgrad, Montenegro to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Danilovgrad, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Danilovgrad to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Danilovgrad.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Danilovgrad, Montenegro not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Egyptian, Balkan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Danilovgrad.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Danilovgrad.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Danilovgrad. Through your servants plant 3 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
